usage.cn: 假朋友从不会当面背叛你，都是背后。
usage.eng: Fake friends never betray in front of you. They always do it behind you.

usage.cn: 即使全世界都背叛你，我也会站在你身边背叛全世界。
usage.eng: If the whole world betrays you,I'm gonna betray the whole world for you.

usage.cn: 最终背叛你的朋友，其实一开始就不是你的朋友。
usage.eng: A friend who betray you in the end, is never your friend from the beginning.
